keywords.value: Fortune's Fool: The Life of John Wilkes Booth (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: For “Fortune’s Fool,” Mr. Alford immersed himself in the world of the Boothies, as the amateur buffs who doggedly research the Lincoln assassination proudly call themselves.

headline.print_headline: Asking Those Who Know Lincoln’s Assassin Best
headline.main: For a Biography of John Wilkes Booth, Terry Alford Turns to Amateur Researchers

snippet: For “Fortune’s Fool,” Mr. Alford immersed himself in the world of the Boothies, as the amateur buffs who doggedly research the Lincoln assassination proudly call themselves.
abstract: Fortune's Fool: The Life of John Wilkes Booth is in-depth biography of Abraham Lincoln's assassin by Terry Alford, who spent 25 years researching subject and got help from amateur history buffs known as 'Boothies,' who obsessively track down information on Booth.
